channel.title: Michael Graupner | Software and System Engineering
channel.description: Recent content on Michael Graupner | Software and System Engineering

item.description: CV Experience 2014-2020 Graupner Engineering, Regensburg, Germany Software engineer, System engineer, Full stack Freelance software engineer creating custom software solutions for small and medium sized businesses. Providing full service from initial requirements gathering, provisioning and installation of server and networking equipment to creating the fontend/backend software itself. B 2014-2015 Graupner Communication Systems, Regensburg, Germany Co-Founder, Software engineer, Full stack Startup that provided communications platforms as a service. Professionals like therapists or physiotherapist could offer their services via phone and customers could book their services and pay
